name: Cape of the Dark Night
flavorText: "Those who seek to do evil are a cowardly and superstitious lot." —Demon Hunter Bayne
flavorTextHtml: "Those who seek to do evil are a cowardly and superstitious lot." —Demon Hunter Bayne

secondary.textHtml: Automatically drop Caltrops when you are hit. This effect may only occur once every 6 seconds. (Demon Hunter Only)
